alert.note: Alert for Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Andrews and south central Gaines Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 553 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gaines County Airport, or near Seminole, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seminole and Gaines County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
